Name: Battery Powered Lantern
Description: Battery Powered Lantern General Category Tools Tech Tier Tier 4 Required Level 30 Description A robust, portable battery-powered lamp. Can be recharged in a Charging Station. Flavor Text Activate with secondary fire. Statistics Weight 0.25 Kg Misc Crafted At Fabricator Prerequisite Charging Station
